Name: Tempered Galaxy Sword
Description: The power of the cosmos courses through you.

DescriptionLocalization.de: Die Kraft des Kosmos fließt durch dich.
DescriptionLocalization.es: El poder del cosmos te atraviesa.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: La puissance du cosmos vous traverse.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Il potere del cosmo ti attraversa.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: コスモスコースのパワーをあなたに。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: O poder do cosmo percorre você.
